item.title: UnMute ME
item.author: invalid@example.com (AntonyGold)
item.dc:creator: AntonyGold
item.content:encoded:
Cucloops muted me for spamming in /w message....with my cousin!!!! we have the same island! I wrote him "chiama" that means "call me" in italian because i accidentally turned off my phone and after i turned it on i asked him to call me in a joking way!!! Because he is my cousin!
I know that i have to talk in english but was a privater message! no one can read that messages!!!! come on and understand me, just contact VictorChannel and ask him....

item.title: Unable to move on Classic Skyblock

item.dc:creator: DaysofGlizzys
item.content:encoded: Yesterday I was playing skyblock and was about to expand when I accidently unshifted when I was building, I fell into the void but now I can't move or play any other game on pika.net, I was really enjoying it, it has good rewards and I am sad that now i can only look at my inventory and look at chat.

item.title: Spawner Ranking
item.author: invalid@example.com (Ronin_Of_Old)
item.dc:creator: Ronin_Of_Old
item.content:encoded:
Upon attempting to get rank 3 of the spawner system, the quest item (Wolf Head) can't be right clicked or it doesn't count in Head storage. I have noticed that the wolf head does not even appear in the head storage area at all. Players can't store the wolf heads or even rank up and buy new spawners because of this bug. Can an admin force a rank up in exchange for the heads required? I am trying to move on to the next rank.
(hoping for a bug fix, Thank you).

item.title: Making money is easy!!!
item.author: invalid@example.com (colorcraft)
item.dc:creator: colorcraft
item.content:encoded:
First for starter:
> You can sell items that is sellable in /shop
> By selling copper stone in minerals shop and lolipops in custom crops shop (if you dont have money for lolipop seeds) /gift colorcraft some random dirt and i can see who need lolipop seeds.
> For more you can contact me on discord dms
My discord is alexyuseyy.
Peace and Love!
